title: Menace: Part 1 - The Sleepers
description: Bill Cowan and Terry Driver discover that the complete crew of a nuclear submarine have been abducted from the London to Portsmouth train.

title: Menace: Part 2 - No Smoke
description: Bill and Chris track the kidnapped sailors to Von Gelb's hideout, where they discover his plans.

title: Menace: Part 3 - The Camp
description: Von Gelb has gained control over a fully armed nuclear submarine, but is unaware that the three teenagers are on his trail.

title: Menace: Part 4 - The Ultimatum
description: Von Gelb demands Â£100 million in diamonds and demonstrates his intentions by launching one of the Polaris missiles.

title: Menace: Part 5 - Face to Face
description: With his threat against Britain successful, Von Gelb turns his attention to the rest of the world. But Buchan is on his trail.

title: Recipe for Danger: Part 1: Too Many Cooks
description: Ships are disappearing from the ocean without a trace.

title: Recipe for Danger: Part 2: One Man's Meat
description: Something suspicious is going on at the Eureka cookery school.

title: Recipe for Danger: Part 3: Trouble Brewing
description: Can the teenagers prevent the "Tromso" from being the next stolen ship?

title: Recipe for Danger: Part 4: Bring to the Boil
description: Buchan discovers the deadly secret of Von Gelb's stolen fleet.

title: The Big Freeze: Part 1: Icarus
description: Eleven of the world's most eminent scientists have disappeared and Terry is kidnapped.

title: The Big Freeze: Part 2: Valkyrie
description: Buchan discovers the power of Von Gelb's mind control device.

title: The Big Freeze: Part 3: Anvil
description: Von Gelb has complete control over the weather and shows he is not afraid to use it.

title: The Big Freeze Part 4: Gotterdammerung
description: Buchan has a plan to destroy Anvil, but is it too dangerous?

title: The Zander Plot: Part 3 - Master Plan
The Zander Plot: Part 4 - The Code
The Zander Plot: Part 5 - The Lighhouse
The Zander Plot: Part 6 - The Stones
The Zander Plot: Part 7 - The Stones
The Secret Base: Part 1: The Key
The Secret Base: Part 2: Black Night
The Secret Base: Part 4: Double Trouble
Nero
description: Ryan and Burke are soon recaptured after escaping from jail ... but by whom?

title: Operation Seagull
description: Buchan is chasing the stolen gold but Nero is one step ahead.

title: Medusa
description: Buchan goes to Paris with the Achilles club while the trio fly into danger.

title: Mayday
description: Ryan and Burke are recaptured but get help from their cell mate.

title: Pirates
description: While the boys go sailing, Sue and Colin track down Nero.

title: The Threat
description: Colin has been shot and Sue is up to her neck in trouble, while Professor Nero is getting closer to perfecting Medusa.

title: Doomsday
description: Nero is becoming increasingly insane, Buchan and his team must prevent him from destroying the world.

title: Black Box
description: Ryan and Burke's have escaped with Nero's black box, and they have the boys captive on their yacht. But Buchan is more concerned with the missing gold.

title: Cypher
description: Buchan believes that the coded message found in the box will lead them to Caine and the gold.

title: The Parcel
description: Buchan and Caine are racing against each other to break the cypher.

title: The Race
description: Caine snatches the gold from under the noses of the Dutch police. Buchan follows him to Amsterdam while Sue and Mike take part in a yacht race.

title: Red Herring
description: Buchan has car problems, Sue and Mike take to bicycles. Caine has a plan to throw them off the scent.

title: Pay Off
description: Buchan has been duped. The teenagers must find out how Caine plans to move the stolen gold.

title: Contact
description: Sue, an art student, and her boyfriend Dave, a mechanic, inadvertently stumble onto a plot by two villains, Naylor and Crouch, to free a dissident scientist from prison.

title: Libra
description: Naylor and Crouch use scientist Hassell's knowledge to steal top-secret technology, Libra, from a military base. They blackmail Dave's dad, Phil, a reformed criminal, into helping with the plot.

title: The Auction
description: Sue attends an art auction with Prof. Rumford. Naylor and Crouch disable the closed-circuit TV system at the National Gallery of Art. Sue and Dave track them to their hideout, but are caught.

title: The Third Man
description: Phil installs a mysterious device in 16 vans. Sue, Dave, Naylor, Crouch, Rumsford, and the vans travel by boat to France. Naylor and Crouch drive to a large chateau owned by Goddard; Sue and Dave follow, hitchhiking.

title: Rapids!
description: Sue and Dave enter the chateau with the help of Jacques, a former resistance fighter. They find painters copying old masters. Naylor and Crouch chase them towards the river, where they take refuge with a canoeing tour group.

title: Darkness at Noon
description: Naylor and Crouch pursue Sue and Dave, but Jacques disables their car. Goddard reveals the purpose of Libra. Sue, Dave, and Jacques follow one of the vans to a fine art museum, and see Libra put to use.

title: Double-Cross!
description: Sue is caught and taken back to the chateau. Goddard reveals his true intentions to Rumsford, who is then locked up. 15 vans return bearing masterpieces stolen from museums and replaced with fakes. Sue and Rumsford escape.

title: Impasse!
description: The stolen paintings are stored in a secret room with a remote-control bomb. Goddard tells Naylor that he never intended to sell them. Jacques sets up a meeting with Goddard; Naylor and Crouch disarm the bomb and steal back the paintings.

title: The Crypt!
description: Naylor and Crouch hole up in a crypt. Cunliffe, a military intelligence officer, arrives and tells Sue and Dave to go home. Pretending to be a buyer for the paintings and Libra, Cunliffe contacts Crouch. Sue and Dave's car breaks down.

title: Switched!
description: Jacques, Rumford, and Cunliffe trick Naylor and Crouch into giving them the paintings, but the pair escape with Libra. Sue and Dave follow. They meet another buyer, Hugh, who spirits them off to England in a helicopter with captive Dave.

title: Break-Up
description: Hugh, Naylor, and Crouch use Libra to briefly shut down a major power station in order to tap into its network. Hugh blackmails Phil and Dave's brother, Bob, an ex-Army engineer, into assisting them.

title: The Think Bank
description: Dave escapes. Naylor and Crouch, followed by Sue and Dave, attend a local fair intending to steal an antique steam tractor. Cunliffe and Sue figure out Hugh's plan to steal secret technology from a covert base.

title: The Hoist
description: Naylor and Crouch proceed to the base in the electronics-proof tractor, but are stopped by Sue, Dave, Bob, and Cunliffe. When Hugh's men arrive they are met by police, the plot foiled. Naylor and Crouch escape and wander off, bickering.
